description.value:
Tech-Heresy Device, when it is connected to a machine, make -20 Tech-Use Test. If successful the machine operated on will have its Machine Spirit shattered and reformatted into a more pliable and useful form, that will obey commands from then on with a +40 Tech-Use Test.

Requirements

Tech-Heresy

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
